Key Match Events: The Braves squandered a four-run sixth-inning lead on Thursday night
The Braves won Friday thanks to Reynaldo López’s strong start and Orlando Arcia’s two homers
Zack Wheeler dominated his hometown team on Saturday
Nick Castellanos got the best of rookie reliever Grant Holmes for the second time in four days with a walk-off single in Sunday’s finale
Post-Match Reflections: Matt Olson said, 'There’s no way to sugarcoat it now. It sucks losing the series'
Brian Snitker said, 'I hope we can. I’d love nothing else than to see them again because that means we’re in.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Braves have just a one-game lead over the Mets in the battle for the NL’s final postseason entry
The Braves have lost three of four to first-place Philadelphia
The Braves have lost six of the first nine games played against Atlanta this year
The Braves wasted another spectacular two-inning scoreless outing from closer Raisel Iglesias
Adam Duvall struck out and is now 4-for-39 with 17 strikeouts against right-handed pitchers since the All-Star break
Others: The Braves finished 14 games behind the Phillies in both of the past two regular seasons
The Phillies needed just four games to eliminate Atlanta from the best-of-five NL Division Series in both 2022 and ‘23
The Braves have 25 games to play
The Braves have just 25 games left in the regular season
